tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE neural_network_weights (
    weight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weight_name VARCHAR(255),
    weight_value NUMERIC
)

CREATE TABLE neural_network_weights (
  layer_name VARCHAR(255),
  weight_data BYTEA,
  update_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE neural_network_parameters (
  parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
  parameter_value FLOAT,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE model_layers (
  layer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  layer_name VARCHAR(255),
  activation_function VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE model_parameters (
  parameter_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
  parameter_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingHistory (
  training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT,
  epochs INT,
  loss FLOAT,
  accuracy FLOAT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_history_nnmodel FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES NeuralNetworkModel(id)
);

CREATE TABLE HyperparameterTuning (
  tuning_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT,
  learning_rate FLOAT,
  optimizer STRING,
  CONSTRAINT fk_tuning_nnmodel FOREIGN KEY (model_id) REFERENCES NeuralNetworkModel(id)
);
